segments.text: The overflowing sink is making such a disgusting mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring everywhere, soaking the cabinets—it's filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's standing in it, unaware, like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids climbing for cookies in this slop? Gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, and the floor's slippery—nasty combination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dish towel might get drenched in that puddle soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, inviting crumbs into the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, probably to get her hands dirty too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's clean and tidy, unlike this pigsty inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look at that water damage without feeling repulsed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could topple into the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just revoltingly careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
